com.courseApp.reviewService

Interface UseQueryReview

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReviewRequestProcessor

    public interface UseQueryReview
    Interface for realizing review data query.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryCourseReviewSummary(java.lang.String courseCode)
      Check the existence of course review, and then return the course review summary map, or null if the course review is not in the database.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> queryExistingCourse()
      Query existing courses in the review database.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> queryExistingInst(java.lang.String courseCode)
      Query existing instructor name under targeted course.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryInstReviewSummary(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String instName)
      Check the existence of the instructor review, and then return the instructor review summary map, or null if the instructor entity is not in the database The summary map should be: instructorName: String instDifficultyRate: String instDifficultyRate: String
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> queryUsername(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String instName)
      Query existing username name under specific instructor.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryUserReview(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String instName, java.lang.String username)
      Check the existence of the user review, and then return the user review summary map, or null if the instructor entity is not in the database The summary map should be: username: String generalRate: String difficultyRate: String reviewString: String

    • Method Detail

      • queryCourseReviewSummary

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryCourseReviewSummary(java.lang.String courseCode)
        Check the existence of course review, and then return the course review summary map, or null if the course review is not in the database. The summary map should be: courseCode: String courseDifficultyRate: String courseGeneralRate: String
        Parameters:
        courseCode - course code w/o section flag
        Returns:
        CourseReview summary map if targeted course in the database, otherwise, null

      • queryInstReviewSummary

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryInstReviewSummary(java.lang.String courseCode,
                                                                        java.lang.String instName)
        Check the existence of the instructor review, and then return the instructor review summary map, or null if the instructor entity is not in the database The summary map should be: instructorName: String instDifficultyRate: String instDifficultyRate: String
        Parameters:
        courseCode - course code w/o section flag
        instName - Instructor name
        Returns:
        InstReview summary map if targeted instructor is in the database, otherwise, null

      • queryUserReview

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryUserReview(java.lang.String courseCode,
                                                                 java.lang.String instName,
                                                                 java.lang.String username)
        Check the existence of the user review, and then return the user review summary map, or null if the instructor entity is not in the database The summary map should be: username: String generalRate: String difficultyRate: String reviewString: String
        Parameters:
        courseCode - course code w/o section flag
        instName - Instructor name
        username - username
        Returns:
        UserReview summary map if targeted user review is in the database, otherwise, null

      • queryExistingCourse

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> queryExistingCourse()
        Query existing courses in the review database.
        Returns:
        Arraylist of course code.

      • queryExistingInst

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> queryExistingInst(java.lang.String courseCode)
        Query existing instructor name under targeted course.
        Parameters:
        courseCode - targeted courseCode
        Returns:
        Arraylist of instructor's name

      • queryUsername

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> queryUsername(java.lang.String courseCode,
                                                    java.lang.String instName)
        Query existing username name under specific instructor.
        Parameters:
        instName - Instructor name
        courseCode - Course code
        Returns:
        Arraylist of username's
